<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/users/get_all/{page}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to get the info about the users in the application.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"description":"The page number to retrieve (1-based index). Each page returns 20 users."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. Returns an object with users statistics in the application.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalUsers":{"type":"integer","description":"The total number of users in the application.\n"},"adminUsers":{"type":"integer","description":"The total number of admin users in the application.\n"},"regularUsers":{"type":"integer","description":"The total number of regular users in the application.\n"},"users":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the user."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the user."},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"The email address of the user."},"password":{"type":"string","description":"The encrypted password of the user."},"admin":{"type":"boolean","description":"The administrtive privilege of the user.\n- `true`: The user has admin privileges.\n- `false`: The user does not have admin previleges.\n"},"__v":{"type":"integer","description":"The version of the user. The version increases whenever the account is modified."}}},"description":"A list of users, including their details."}},"example":{"totalUsers":51,"adminUsers":11,"regularUsers":40,"users":[{"_id":"6555a0f89feeac7dccd9b1dd","name":"first account","email":"first_account@gmail.com","password":"$2a$10$jK1bvjH7D/pdjI6mVb9uSuXMeWwcFwhlBYIh7Wqf0CLsey9I3Epx2","admin":false,"__v":0}]}}}}},"400":{"description":"See message description."},"500":{"description":"see message description."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
